body: Please provide any additional information below. Game Log is too long to be posted here, grab it from dropbox instead https://www.dropbox.com/s/sik9hxtxyj8w87m/game_2.log Seems to me if mini max wants to give up but then it wouldn't find the concede button...
author: [Landhotel.Westerwald](https://code.google.com/u/Landhotel.Westerwald/)
title: Mini Max AI 6/8 has 12 cards on hand, no land out there, passes the turn and discards 2 swamps at end
content:
